Pure Social

An upscale dining and nightlife venue and lounge offering a fusion menu, handcrafted cocktails, weekend brunch, and live DJs for R&B nights and poetry slams.

City: Richardson
Area: East Richardson
Category: Black-Owned, Brunch, Live DJ, Lounge, Restaurant & Bar, Happy Hour

Wed-Sun evenings (4_pm-2_am) & weekend brunch

üí∞ Cost: $$

Website Map

Chicken & Pickle

Chicken N Pickle is a unique indoor/outdoor entertainment complex combining a casual, chef-driven restaurant with pickleball courts, yard games, and spaces for live entertainment.

City: Grand Prairie
Area: Central
Category: Restaurant & Bar, Sports Bar

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Chocolate Secrets

Chocolate Secrets is a Black-owned gourmet chocolate and fine wine boutique cafe offering artisanal chocolates, truffles, and desserts. Guests can enjoy live jazz performances, art exhibits, and an elegant atmosphere that makes it a perfect spot for indulgence and relaxation.

City: Dallas
Area: Oak Lawn
Category: Black-Owned, Live Music Venue, Spoken Word

Live music Thursdays 7:30-1130p, spoken word Tuesdays

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Cigars International

Cigars International in The Colony is a 6,000+ square foot cigar superstore offering over 1,300 cigar brands, a full-service bar, and spacious indoor and outdoor lounges, providing a premier destination for cigar enthusiasts.

City: The Colony
Area:
Category: Cigar Lounge

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

City: Dallas
Area: Mockingbird Station
Category: Cocktail Bar, Lounge, Live DJ

Sundays

üí∞ Cost: $

Ladylove Lounge

Ladylove Lounge & Sound is a vinyl record listening lounge and live music venue that offers quality cocktails and bites. With its warm red lighting and intimate seating, it encourages conversation and celebrates diversity through eclectic music programming.

City: Dallas
Area: Bishop Arts District
Category: Lounge, Live Music Venue, Cocktail Bar

Tuesdays

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Area: Deep Ellum
Category: Black-Owned, Restaurant & Bar

üí∞ Cost: $$

The Reserve

The Reserve offers exquisite Mexican cuisine in an elegant setting, with locations in Euless and Las Colinas. Guests can enjoy fresh ingredients, bold flavors, and a memorable dining atmosphere.

City: Irving
Area: Las Colinas
Category: Mexican Restaurant, Upscale Dining, Restaurant & Bar

Fridays

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Tequila Social

Tequila Social is a lively Tex-Mex restaurant and tequila garden located on the Katy Trail. Guests can enjoy sizzling fajitas, tacos, and a variety of tequila-based cocktails in a casual, dog-friendly setting.

City: Dallas
Area: Harwood District
Category: Happy Hour, Restaurant & Bar

4-6 pm

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Vice Park

Vice Park is a dynamic entertainment venue in the heart of Dallas, offering a unique blend of day and night experiences. With its rooftop setting, guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city skyline while dancing to music from renowned DJs. The venue features multiple themed areas, including the Sky Club and Beach Club, each providing a distinct ambiance for patrons.

City: Dallas
Area: Baylor
Category: Live DJ, Live Music Venue, Day Party

June 18-7p-12a

üí∞ Cost:

Website Map

Palmer's Hot Chicken

Palmer's Hot Chicken brings authentic Nashville hot chicken to Dallas, offering a range of heat levels alongside catfish, shrimp, and Southern sides. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and featured on "Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives," it's a must-visit for spicy food lovers.

City: Dallas
Area: Lakewood
Category: Happy Hour, Restaurant & Bar

Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, HH 3-6pm

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

A cozy cocktail bar in Uptown offering an extensive and creative drink menu, ideal for date nights and social gatherings.

Area: Uptown
Category: Cocktail Bar, Rooftop Bar, Lounge

Mondays

üí∞ Cost: $$

The Alley Music House

The Alley Music House is a speakeasy-style venue offering exceptional cocktails and unforgettable live performances. It's a hidden gem in Addison, perfect for music lovers and night owls.

City: Addison
Area: Addison
Category: Live DJ, Live Music Venue

Thursdays

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Babous

Babou's is a luxurious, subterranean cocktail lounge located beneath Hotel Swexan. Inspired by Salvador Dale's pet ocelot, the venue offers a surreal, art-infused atmosphere with live jazz, inventive cocktails, and an opulent setting that invites guests to drink, dance, and discover.

City: Dallas
Area: Uptown
Category: Live Music Venue, Happy Hour, Restaurant & Bar

Thursdays

üí∞ Cost: $

Map

Temptations Lounge

Black-owned Caribbean lounge with DJs and Latin night Wednesdays.

City: Arlington
Area: South Cooper
Category: Nightlife/Lounge, Cultural Event

Wednesdays (Latin), Saturdays / evenings

üí∞ Cost: $$

Map

Thompson's Bookstore Cocktail Bar

Hidden cocktail lounge beneath bookstore, password entry, creative cocktails, speakeasy downstairs

City: Fort Worth
Area: Downtown
Category: Speakeasy/Cocktail Bar

Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays / evenings

üí∞ Cost: $$,$$$

Map

Double D's

Double D's is a retro-inspired bar featuring 1970s-era decor, including wood paneling and vintage furnishings. It offers an upscale yet laid-back cocktail menu, creating a nostalgic atmosphere that transforms into a lively dance party as the night progresses.

City: Dallas
Area: Design District
Category: Nightlife/Lounge, Date Spot, Day Party

üí∞ Cost: $$

Map

HIDE is an award-winning bar known for its unique signature cocktails and outstanding food. With a spacious rooftop patio offering downtown views, it's a go-to spot for craft drinks and elevated bar fare in a vibrant setting.

City: Dallas
Area: Lowest Greenville

üí∞ Cost: $
